Oct. 11, 1997 D West Wales BBA Contest (First Section)

Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Burry Port. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 6 bands competed.
